doc.field: Lloyd Trufelman Collection on Artists' Television Network
Lloyd Trufelman Collection on Artists' Television Network

Lloyd Trufelman was active in the Downtown New York City experimental arts scene in the 1970s and 1980s, and worked with Jaime Davidovich as part of the Artists' Television Network. This collection (dated 1979-1980) consists of materials collected by Trufelman documenting the activities of the Artists' Television Network (ATN). Materials include postcards featuring art by Jaime Davidovich; press releases for "Shock Opera," a mixed media work performed by ATN, Hurrah, and Youthinasia; and a copy of Video magazine featuring an article on Davidovich, ATN, and video artists more generally.

This collection (dated 1979-1980) consists of materials collected by Lloyd Trufelman documenting the activities of the Artists' Television Network (ATN). Materials include postcards featuring art by Jaime Davidovich; press releases for "Shock Opera," a mixed media work performed by ATN, Hurrah, and Youthinasia; and a copy of Video magazine featuring an article on Davidovich, ATN, and video artists more generally.
Lloyd Trufelman was active in the Downtown New York City experimental arts scene in the 1970s and 1980s, and worked with Jaime Davidovich as part of the Artists' Television Network.
Donated by Lloyd Trufelman in January 2018; the accession number associated with this gift is 2018.119.
